title: The owner shall be entitled for Amenity TDR against the construction of amenity, if any, as per TDR Regulation
clause_text: The owner shall be entitled for Amenity TDR against the construction of amenity, if any, as per TDR Regulation.
section: General conditions / notes to allow development under above regulations :-
